This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: A trail unlike I have ever seen before, rotating counterclockwise and changing in size and shape
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving in the car on I-77 when I looked to my right and saw something I have never seen in the sky before. What looked to be a huge rod going straight up into the sky. After further observation it was clear that this was a trail of some kind. The strange part about it was that it did a countrclockwise full turn around, changing in width, color, and direction. In my heart and mind all I could think about was that this was not a natural cloud formation. What is was will always be beyond me. The anomaly was unvisible when night set in. I will be keeping my eyes more open to the skies of the Carolinas from now on.
